Package chess.pieces

Class Pawn

java.lang.Object
chess.Chess
chess.pieces.Pawn
public class Pawn
extends Chess
This class is used to create a Pawn piece object, it extends the Chess class to inherit and override some methods
Author:
Advith Chegu, Banty Patel

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) java.lang.String color
    This field is used to identify the color of the Pawn piece
    (package private) int count
    This field is used to indicate the number of moves the pawn is out of its original spot
    (package private) boolean first
    This field is used to indicate if it is pawn's first move
    (package private) java.lang.String id
    This field is to used identify the Pawn piece on the chess board
    (package private) boolean two_step
    This field is used to indicate if the pawn performed a two-step as the first move

    Fields inherited from class chess.Chess

    chess_board

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Pawn​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String color)
    This is the constructor used to create a Pawn Object in the Chess class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getColor()
    This method return the color of the Pawn
    int getCount()
    This method gets the count of moves that a pawn is out of its original space, which is the count field This field is used to check if an en passant can occur
    java.lang.String getId()
    This method returns the id of the Pawn
    boolean getTwoStep()
    This method gets the pawn's boolean field, "two_step", value to see if the pawn had made a 2-step move as it's first move true = performed a 2-step as initial move, false = did not perform the 2-step as it's first move or has not moved yet
    boolean isfirstMove()
    This method checks whether a specific pawn piece has made it's first move yet true = it is the first move for the pawn, false = not the first move for that pawn
    boolean isValid​(int[] start, int[] dest)
    This method return a boolean indicating whether the move made is valid for a Pawn piece
    boolean move_makes_check​(int[] start, int[] dest)
    This method checks to see if the move will put or keep the King in check
    void setCount​(int i)
    This method sets the count field of a pawn
    void setPawnFirst​(boolean boo)
    This method sets the pawn's boolean field, "first"
    void setTwoStep​(boolean boo)
    This method sets the pawn's boolean field, "two_step"

    Methods inherited from class chess.Chess

    find_indexes, getMoved, getSpots, initBoard, isCheck, main, occupy, printBoard, setMoved, updateBoard

    • getTwoStep

      public boolean getTwoStep()
      This method gets the pawn's boolean field, "two_step", value to see if the pawn had made a 2-step move as it's first move true = performed a 2-step as initial move, false = did not perform the 2-step as it's first move or has not moved yet
      Overrides:
      getTwoStep in class Chess
      Returns:
      boolean - returns the value of the two_step boolean

    • getCount

      public int getCount()
      This method gets the count of moves that a pawn is out of its original space, which is the count field This field is used to check if an en passant can occur
      Overrides:
      getCount in class Chess
      Returns:
      int - the number of moves in which the a pawn has been out of its original place

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid​(int[] start, int[] dest)
      This method return a boolean indicating whether the move made is valid for a Pawn piece
      Overrides:
      isValid in class Chess
      Parameters:
      start - - int array holding starting indexes (0:row, 1:col)
      dest - - int array holding destination indexes (0:row, 1:col)
      Returns:
      boolean - value of whether the Pawn can make the move

    • move_makes_check

      public boolean move_makes_check​(int[] start, int[] dest)
      This method checks to see if the move will put or keep the King in check
      Overrides:
      move_makes_check in class Chess
      Parameters:

      Returns:
